# Problem 11.19 {.unnumbered}

## Problem Statement

A beam of length L = 15 ft is subjected to a distributed load as shown where w<sub>0</sub> = 25 kip/ft. Determine the magnitude of the deflection at x = 0.5L. Assume EI = 45,000 kip-ft<sup>2</sup>.
